text: Many difficulties which nature throws in our way, may be smoothed away by the exercise of intelligence.
author: Titus Livius

text: Human judges can show mercy. But against the laws of nature, there is no appeal.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

text: Now it is human nature to want to eat to ones fill when hungry, to want to warm up when cold, to want to rest when tired. These all are a part of people's emotional nature.
author: Xun Zi

text: I am more and more convinced that our happiness or our unhappiness depends far more on the way we meet the events of life than on the nature of those events themselves.
author: Wilhelm von Humboldt

text: Go forth under the open sky, and list To Nature's teachings.
author: William C. Bryant
